actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6(d) (1) of the Military Selective Service Act (50 USC App. 456(d) (1) to provide greater training flexibility for Reserve officers ordered to active duty for training for not more than six months by deleting the requirement that they be ordered to active duty for not less than three months.

summary.text: Amends the Military Selective Service Act to delete the requirement that Reserve officers who are ordered to active duty for not more than six months be on such duty for at least three months.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6(d) (1) of the Military Selective Service Act (50 USC App. 456(d) (1) to provide greater training flexibility for Reserve officers ordered to active duty for training for not more than six months by deleting the requirement that they be ordered to active duty for not less than three months.
